data.title: Locals
data.meta_description: The Alberta Union of Provincial Employees' membership is divided into different Locals. Find a Local by keyword, employer name, or membership sector.
data.text:
Welcome, member.

Sign in to view your personalized contact directory and collective bargaining agreements, and view and update your member profile.

Member ID or email

Your member ID is six digits. If you don't know your member ID, enter your personal email address.

New to MyAUPE? Create Your Account

New to MyAUPE? Create your account.

Create your account.

Create an account to view your personalized contact directory and collective bargaining agreements, and view and update your member profile.

Don't know your AUPE member ID number? Use the member ID lookup tool to look it up.

Member ID (6 digits)

Please provide your member ID number.

Personal Email

Please do not use your work email for your MyAUPE union account.

Validation method

We require either your postal code or your last name to validate your member information.

Postal Code

Last Name

Home postal code

Please enter your home postal code.

Your last name

Please enter your last name.

Create a password

Must be a minimum of 8 characters.

Verify password

By creating an account, you agree to AUPEâ€™s Privacy & Legal Statement and Terms of use.

Already have an account? Sign in.
